‚ú® Vibrio fischeri.title: The Glowing Socialite

ü©∏ Streptococcus pyogenes.title: The Sneaky Troublemaker

üß∞ Escherichia coli (E. coli).personality: You are adaptable, resilient, and extremely cooperative. You thrive in busy systems where teamwork and versatility matter most. You‚Äôre not terribly dangerous, but your influence is everywhere because of how reliably you function.
